Module.name: sketch
Module.Class: Represents an interactive, animation that runs in the Pygame window.
Represents a graphical object or character capable of interaction. a b c d

Function.name: flipAll(imgs, xflip, yflip) → list
Function.span: Performs a horizontal and/or vertical flip on a sequence of Image instances. Returns a new list of images.
Function.Arg: Indicates whether to flip the images horizontally.
Indicates whether to flip the images vertically.

Module.Function: This is the default event handler function for VIDEORESIZE events. The function scales all sprite properties to the resized sketch size and returns the scale factor. A reference to the Sketch instance. A reference to the pygame.event.EventType object.

Constant.name: VISIBLE
Constant.span: Used as a Sprite instance’s status property to indicate that the sprite is to be drawn and updated.

Constant.name: HIDDEN
Constant.span: Used as a Sprite instance’s status property to indicate that the sprite is to be updated but not drawn.

Constant.name: DISABLED
Constant.span: Used as a Sprite instance’s status property to indicate that the sprite is not to be drawn or updated.

Module.Constant: Indicates that a sprite is not disabled.
Indicates no action to be taken when the sprite reaches the edge of the sketch.
Indicates that the sprite bounces from the edge of the sketch.
Indicates that the sprite wraps to the far edge when crossing an edge of the sketch.
Indicates that the sprite is to be removed when it leaves the sketch area.
